title: Mauricio Pochettino - Wikipedia
snippet: Mauricio Roberto Pochettino Trossero (born 2 March 1972) is an Argentine professional football manager and former player who is the current head coach of the United States men's national team.

title: Mauricio Pochettino Manager Profile, Record & Stats | Premier League
snippet: Pochettino guided Espanyol to a 10th-place finish, then 11th and eighth in the following two seasons, narrowly missing out on a UEFA Europa League spot in 2010/11.

title: Five Things to Know: Mauricio Pochettino | U.S. Soccer Official Website
snippet: READ: Mauricio Pochettino Named Head Coach of U.S. Men's National Team · The 52-year-old Argentine now begins his next chapter with the USMNT after successful coaching spells in Spain, England, and France dating back to his managerial debut at RCD Espanyol in 2009. title: Everything About Mauricio Pochettinoâ€™s Family Background & Personal Life- Parents, Siblings, Nationalities, & More - EssentiallySports
snippet: Born on March 2, 1972, Mauricio Pochettino spent his childhood in Murphy, Argentina. Technically, he is of Italian descent, as his great-grandfather moved from Italy to Argentina many years ago.
